game.name: Neon Sigil
game.genres: Action, Casual, Massively Multiplayer, Sports, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Steam Turn Notifications, Remote Play Together, HDR available
game.shortDescription: Neon Sigil is a lightning-fast, skill-based 1v1 arena duel with precise movement, tough mind games, and fair readability—no pay-to-win, just skill.
